analyses.title: Sales Performance Analysis
analyses.context: Analyze overall sales performance across different branches and cities.

sub_analyses.title: Total Sales by Branch
sub_analyses.why: To understand which branch is generating the highest sales revenue.

sub_analyses.title: Total Sales by City
sub_analyses.why: To identify cities with the highest sales, aiding in location-based strategy.

sub_analyses.title: Average Sales Per Transaction
sub_analyses.why: To determine the average transaction size, useful for setting sales targets.

analyses.title: Customer Demographics Analysis
analyses.context: Evaluate demographic trends among customers to tailor marketing strategies.

sub_analyses.title: Sales by Customer Type
sub_analyses.why: To distinguish sales patterns between different customer types.
answers: Sales comparison between Member and Normal customers

sub_analyses.title: Gender-based Sales Patterns
sub_analyses.why: To identify if there are significant sales differences based on customer gender.
answers: Sales comparison between male and female customers

analyses.title: Product Line Performance Analysis
analyses.context: Analyze performance across different product categories.

sub_analyses.title: Total Sales by Product Line
sub_analyses.why: To understand which product lines are most profitable.

sub_analyses.title: Average Sales Price per Product Line
sub_analyses.why: To evaluate pricing strategies for different product categories.

sub_analyses.title: Sales Volume per Product Line
sub_analyses.why: To identify product lines with the highest sales volumes.
answers: Product line with highest sales volume

analyses.title: Financial Metrics Analysis
analyses.context: Examine key financial metrics like profit and cost efficiency.

sub_analyses.title: Analysis of Taxes and Total Sales
sub_analyses.why: To assess the impact of tax on overall sales figures.

sub_analyses.title: Cost of Goods Sold Analysis
sub_analyses.why: To determine the cost efficiency related to sales.

sub_analyses.title: Gross Income Analysis
sub_analyses.why: To calculate the profitability from gross income figures.

analyses.title: Customer Feedback Analysis
analyses.context: Evaluate customer satisfaction through ratings analysis.

sub_analyses.title: Average Customer Rating
sub_analyses.why: To determine the overall customer satisfaction levels.

sub_analyses.title: Distribution of Customer Ratings
sub_analyses.why: To identify common satisfaction trends among customers.
